title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, April 3, 2022
description: Today is the 88th birthday of Dr. Jane Goodall who said “What makes us human, I think, is the ability to ask questions, a consequence of our sophisticated spoken language.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 88th birthday of Dr. Jane Goodall who said “What makes us human, I think, is the ability to ask questions, a consequence of our sophisticated spoken language.”
